mapper.select: SELECT PRS_SEQ, USER_ID, PRS_TITLE, PRS_CONTENT, PRS_START, PRS_END, PRS_CREATE, PRS_DELFLAG FROM USER_SCHEDULE WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND PRS_DELFLAG = 'N' AND (PRS_START BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-02-29', 'YYYY-MM-DD') OR PRS_END BETWEEN TO_DATE('2024-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-02-29', 'YYYY-MM-DD'));
SELECT PRS_SEQ, USER_ID, PRS_TITLE, PRS_CONTENT, PRS_START, PRS_END, PRS_CREATE, PRS_DELFLAG FROM USER_SCHEDULE WHERE PRS_SEQ = #{prs_seq} AND USER_ID = #{user_id} AND PRS_DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_SCHEDULE(PRS_SEQ, USER_ID, PRS_TITLE, PRS_CONTENT, PRS_START, PRS_END, PRS_CREATE) VALUES(USER_SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{prs_title}, #{prs_content}, TO_DATE('2024-01-22T15:30:15', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE('2024-02-01T15:30:15', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_SCHEDULE WHERE PRS_SEQ=#{prs_seq} AND USER_ID = #{user_id};
